title: Impact damage 15" 2011
message:
Got a 2011 15" in which boots fine with its original ssd but once I use a external drive or put a different drive in the machine it just sits at the loading bar.

It was put on the roof of a car and he just drove off. No liquid damage. I put it in our airing cupboard for an hour and it boots to a external drive now. Does this point towards the gpu? If so is there a way of "disabling" the gpu? since the customer donated the machine I was thinking of giving it to my mum for browsing the internet so nothing graphics intensive.

title: Impact damage 15" 2011
message: First heat up the GPU to rule out a normal GPU failure(needs replaced of course). If that does not help this board is scrap.

title: Impact damage 15" 2011
message: Heated up the gpu and it's now working fine. Is there no way to just bypass the discrete gpu?
